name: one night at Jake's
description:
warning! : all of the assets are not mine,  I have got permission to upload this to itch.io,  all credits to bellringstudios  here is his profile: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/bellringstudios/

survive for one night at Jake's.

tip: don't touch Jake

hot keys:

w to put cams up

s to put cams down

space to open barrier

1-3 to switch cams
